name: getUserInfo

return.type: {; profileAccess: int,; first: string,; last: string,; birth: date,; nationality: string;}

desc: This function returns protected information about the user.;The result will only be populated if the user has given you access to the information.
errors: You are not friends with this user

name: searchUsers

params.name: per_page
params.desc: Number of results to return per page maximum. (max 20, default 5)

params.name: prev_username
params.desc: The last search result returned in the previous call for pageination

params.name: room
params.desc: The room UID to search in or null for all rooms

return.desc: An array of users matching the search string.;Populated with the minimal information set.

desc: This function searches for users matching the search string.

name: sendFriendRequest

params.name: receiver
params.desc: The UID of the user we want to send a friend request to

desc: This function sends a friend request to the user with the given UID.
errors: You can't send a friend request to yourself

name: acceptFriendRequest

params.name: uid
params.desc: The UID of the user we want to accept a friend request from

desc: This function accepts a friend request from the user with the given UID.
errors: You can't accept your own friend request

name: denyFriendRequest

params.name: uid
params.desc: The UID of the user we want to deny a friend request from

desc: This function denies a friend request from the user with the given UID.
errors: User can't deny their own friendrequest

name: removeFriend

params.name: uid
params.desc: The UID of the user we want to remove as a friend

desc: This function removes a friend from our friend list.
errors: User can't remove themselves as friend
